verbose_text: Beef carcasses of animals slaughtered in two abattoirs of Merida, the capital city of the state of Yucatan [XREF_BIBR], were sampled and it was found that over 78% of renal, muscular, and liver tissue samples had Cu levels above the permitted limits [XREF_BIBR] and 67% of the samples had Pb levels higher than what is allowed [XREF_BIBR].
